content.body: bakkot: it seems like `it.map(f)` and `it.flatMap(f)`, for an `f` that doesn't return an iterator, aren't the same - iow, it seems like a mapper of `x => x` will throw in GetIteratorFlattenable if `x` isn't an Object. was that an intentional decision?
